instructions:
Mix the cheese, oil, onion, and peppers. Slice open one side of each steak, creating a pocket. Stuff with 1/4 of the pepper mixture and fasten with a toothpick.
Season the steaks with pepper. Grill or broil to desired doneness.
ingredients: 4 (6 ounce) sirloin steaks, trimmed of fat
title: Stuffed Grilled Pepper Steaks
